alert.note: Alert for North Laramie Range; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 09 at 2:22PM MDT until October 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 12 to 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...North Laramie Range, Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hunters, campers, and hikers may experience very poor visibility and could become disoriented or lost.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: North Laramie Range; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range
